snippet: As Mrs. Clinton weighs another run for the presidency, her new book is likely to provide campaign fodder for supporters and critics alike.
abstract: Much-anticipated memoir of Hillary Rodham Clinton's time as secretary of state is set for release in June as she weighs another run for the presidency; book is likely to provide campaign fodder for supporters and critics alike.
lead_paragraph: As Mrs. Clinton weighs another run for the presidency, her new book is likely to provide campaign fodder for supporters and critics alike.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Latest Memoir to Be Released in June
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton’s Latest Memoir to Be Released in June
